title: Permanently removing SaveFrom.net Helper bookmark from Firefox bookmark
content:
How can I remove SaveFrom.net Helper bookmark permanently from Mozilla Firefox bookmark, so that it does not reappear whenever I start Firefox?

I remove it many times, but it reappear when I restart the Firefox.

Please Help.
creator: vanlalngaia

title: My wirless printer will not conect to my computer
content:
I have a HP office jet 6500 printer. It has been working fine from my Ubuntu Computer using Firefox . Since downloading the latest version of Firefox I cannot connect to the printer and there for cannot print or scan.

The printer is still working normally from a second computer using Windows10.

I have tried re installing the printer but that has made no difference.

I am wondering if the problem could be caused by the Firefox fire wall. Help please. Please note I don't even know enough to be dangerous so any help will need to be extremely basic. I know my name everything else will need to be explained step by step,

Thanks

John
creator: JPB54

title: Usage of spaces
content: When I watch a video, no matter what website I am on, if I press the space bar to pause, the browser will automatically enter or exit the full screen. Can I turn off this function?

title: Firefox not loading some sites, but loading others
content:
I am pulling my hair out... I have used Firefox for years. Two days ago, Firefox stopped loading some (but not all) pages. It tries for a long time, then an error is given "The connection was reset. The connection to the server was reset while the page was loading." I have refreshed Firefox (tried multiple times). I have run in troubleshoot mode (tried multiple times). I have disabled all of the extensions I was using. I resorted to uninstalling and reinstalling Firefox (have done this twice now). Still, some websites are not loading. Examples include weebly.com, pandora.com, dictionary.com, and other websites that I have built with weebly. These websites load fine if I use Chrome. I am using Firefox 90.0 (64-bit) and Windows 10 Home that is completely up-to-date.

Does anyone have an idea of what happened? I really don't want to resort to using a different browser.

Thank you in advance.

-DB
creator: buskirk55

title: stranger thing
content: My firefox web browser. Everytime I open firefox web browser. Firefox opens old tabs that I save at the same time and automatically opens many strange websites without my knowledge. And my Kaspersky antivirus always turns on virus warnings for strange websites.
